item.description:
Directions to Compo Beach


The 2008 Minute Man Race
Sunday April 27th, 2008
Compo Beach, Westport CT


For additional information on the
Minute Man Race or to become a sponsor please email cynthiabernard@optonline.net













VIA I-95
From New York:
Exit 17 (Saugatuck). Continue straight off ramp, through two traffic lights. At the third light, turn left onto Riverside Avenue. At the next traffic light, turn right onto Bridge Street, cross the Saugatuck River and at the next traffic light; turn right onto South Compo Road (Route 136). Pass underneath railroad overpass and highway bridge. Continue down South Compo Road. At the stop sign next to the Minute Man statue, make a right. Continue on Beachside Avenue. Entrance to Compo Beach will be on your right.


From New Haven:
Exit 18 (Sherwood Island Connector Road). Bear right off ramp. At second traffic light, turn left onto Greens Farms Road. Continue through a stop sign and at the following traffic light, turn left onto South Compo Road (Route 136). Pass underneath railroad overpass and highway bridge. Continue down South Compo Road. At the stop sign next to the Minute Man statue, make a right. Continue on Beachside Avenue. Entrance to Compo Beach will be on your right.
item.why: Nice run, great t-shirt, food and prizes...and a sunday brunch at the beach down in Westport's Compo area.
item.name: Westport,Ct. 5K and 10K Run along the shoreline
